Griefwalker.narrative: This plan is quiet, gentle, and won’t overwhelm. It’s built for rest, not stress.
Griefwalker.ritual: Close your eyes. Say the names you carry. Choose peace again.

Fighter.narrative: You need a plan that fights back. Appeal rights. Quick access. Real doctors who listen.
Fighter.ritual: You’ve survived before. Say your full name. Stand back up.

Self-Protector.narrative: Boundaries matter. This plan respects your space—low calls, no upsells.
Self-Protector.ritual: Breathe in safety. Exhale obligation. This one is for you.

Seeker.narrative: This plan is your launchpad. No referrals. Broad network. Follow your curiosity.
Seeker.ritual: Light a candle. Ask a question. Let this plan carry you forward.

Solo Architect.narrative: Minimalist. Clear. Efficient. This plan is for those who think in grids and care in silence.
Solo Architect.ritual: Sort. Filter. Choose. This is yours to architect.

Connector.narrative: You care for others. This plan supports caregivers and connects you to the community.
Connector.ritual: Think of someone you love. This plan protects them too.

Nurturer.narrative: You’re in healing mode. This plan integrates physical, mental, and spiritual care.
Nurturer.ritual: Place your hand on your chest. Say: I am worthy of care.
